ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Pets need weapons?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well acoording to verant it was because when they gave magi pets weapons the delay factor plus duel wield madde them to powerful. If anything else though it
ygData.messageBody:
Well acoording to verant it was because when they gave magi pets weapons the
delay factor plus duel wield madde them to powerful. If anything else though
it would of been the necro pets though. You could send one of them into exe
room and have them solo it all bythemself. Sage too except for the sage
iteself.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Garett <osmosis@...>
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Date: Sunday, June 25, 2000 10:27 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Pets need weapons?


>Enchanter pets begin to bash and kick at low levels (cant remember when),
>and dual wield at level 29. I believe that at level 39 they gain double
>attack.
>
>One question that I have, that probably cant be answered, is : Why is it
>that I can summon a pet, who appears with sword and shield in hand, and
give
>it a single dagger... causing it to dual wield daggers? Where is it
getting
>the second dagger from? I've also seen some pets that are dual wielding 2H
>weapons (hang around a spectre killing group with pets and you'll likely
see
>this happen...) This includes enchanter pets... I've personally had a pet
>that was two floating scythes.
>
>Even after the pet-nerf, I still enjoy using my pet to solo @ level 45.
>Although its more exciting to use the charm methods to fight solo, there is
>something to be said for having a pet that you know will never turn on you.
>I'd also like to point out to the younger enchanters out there that if you
>summon a pet, for goodenss sakes use every buff you possibly can on them
>(shade line, speed + line, strengthen, feedback)... and if you have a
cleric
>in your group be sure that he/she buffs it as though it were any other
tank.
>Our pets have minimal hit points but other than that fact are efficient
>little slice and dicers. I would also like to point out that the entire
>reason for the pet nerf a few months back was because our pets were FAR
>tougher than any other pet at high levels (when properly prepared with low
>delay weapons and 'swift like the wind').... imagine how cheated the mages
>felt!
>
>Cogg - RZ
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: <Nilen23@...>
>To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
>Sent: Sunday, June 25, 2000 5:15 PM
>Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Pets need weapons?
>
>

>pets
